newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy says Q1 PSBR 24.0 trillion lire.
newsitem.headline: Italy says Q1 PSBR 24.0 trillion lire.

text.p: Italy's cumulative public sector borrowing requirement was around 24.0 trillion lire at end-March 1997, compared with 46.324 trillion in the first quarter last year, the Treasury Ministry said in a statement.
It said the borrowing requirement in March was 17.5 trillion lire, more than 3.0 trillion less than in March 1996.
The statement gave no further data but said the figures were worked out in accordance with a ruling in March by Eurostat, the EU's statistics body.
